questions: Q. 1. Which type of powers does the community government of Belgium enjoy ?
answers: Ans. This government has the power regarding culture, education and language related issues.

questions: Q. 2. What is the Prudential reason behind power sharing ? 			  Or 		Why power sharing is good for democracies ?
answers: Ans. It reduces the possibility of conflict between social groups.

questions: Q. 3. Which system of power sharing is called, ‘Checks and Balances’ ?
